introduction: SYNOPSISAfter the Korean War, in a quiet village of women divers on Jeju Island, the villagers select the leader of woman divers called 'Sang-gun woman diver'. The Sang-gun must maintain her virtue even if she became a widow. She had to be the model for all women divers. The village people hold the Dragon King Ritual annually. It was the rule that one didn't engage in any corrupt behavior starting a few days before the ritual begins. With the ritual soon at hand, Sun-nyeo, the last Sang-gun, looks about the village. She witnesses Jang Tae-wun and a young woman diver making love. The ritual passes by quietly but then the village is hit with misfortune due to their act. Tae-wun also goes after Sun-nyeo, the young Sang-gun, relentlessly. After much anguish, Sun-nyeo gives in.故事6.25 sanggun潜水员在济州女性潜水员任何宁静的村庄的领导者之后。Sanggun潜水员富达甚至是寡妇，应该是最好的所有潜水员。村里有一个jinaeneunde一年yongwangje一次，有一个不应该是非法行为，数天前的法律。在sunnyeo最后sanggun潜水员是一个章节提前yongwangje烧见证与一个年轻的潜水员分享这爱纱般的村庄。Yongwangje通过从他村里不祥之物悄然发生驰诱惑。她还背着片倒塌是无情地接近年轻潜水员sanggun的sunnyeo和痛苦。
